title: The Greater Shadow
goal: Reveal that Valerius was merely a pawn, and the true, overarching antagonist and threat still remains, setting up future conflicts.
stakes_shift: The immediate threat is gone, but a far greater, unknown danger looms, shifting the focus from a local problem to a world-spanning conflict.

bridge.from_prev: The city is recovering, but the blight's ultimate source is unknown.
bridge.to_next: A new quest is set, and Eldrin fully embraces his destiny as the Awakened Sage.

sections.title: A Pawn's Demise
sections.intent: Confirm Valerius's subordinate role, hinting at a higher power.

scenes.summary: Through Valerius's remaining journals and Eldrin's insights, they realize he was merely a puppet, manipulated by a greater, unseen force.
scenes.outcome: The group discovers Valerius was a pawn, serving a larger, unseen antagonistic force.

sections.title: Whispers from the Void
sections.intent: Provide a first, unsettling glimpse or hint of the true, overarching antagonist.

scenes.summary: Eldrin senses a vast, ancient darkness stirring beyond the immediate blight, a chilling presence far more potent than Valerius.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin senses the true, immense power of the overarching Shadow Blight, far beyond Valerius's influence.

sections.title: The Unseen Threat
sections.intent: The group acknowledges the true scale of the threat and the need for a larger quest.

scenes.summary: The group understands that the battle against Valerius was but a skirmish, and a far greater, more ancient Shadow Blight looms over the world.
scenes.outcome: The group acknowledges the vast, global scale of the Shadow Blight and the need for a grander quest.
